references.paper_title: Learning under concept drift: A review
references.reason: This is a comprehensive review paper on concept drift, a core topic related to the self-healing machine learning framework proposed in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Failing loudly: An empirical study of methods for detecting dataset shift
references.reason: This paper provides an empirical evaluation of various dataset shift detection methods, which is relevant to the monitoring and diagnosis components of self-healing ML.

references.paper_title: A survey on concept drift adaptation
references.reason: This paper surveys various concept drift adaptation techniques, providing context for the self-healing ML's approach to adaptation strategies.

references.paper_title: Rcd: A recurring concept drift framework
references.reason: This paper introduces a framework for handling recurring concept drift, which is directly relevant to the self-healing paradigm and adaptation challenges addressed in the main paper.
This paper proposes a method for handling recurring concept drift that informs the adaptation strategies discussed in the main paper.
